name: Sigman 6-inch Tarp Ball Bungees - 25 Pack
description: Use the tarp ball bungees to easily fasten tarps to canopy frames or other similar frame structures through the tarp grommets. Tarp ball bungees tie down tarps to canopy frames without without punching holes or damage to the tarps. The 6-inch tarp ball bungees fits most tarps with grommets. The bungee length is approximately 6 inches. Ball size is approximately 1 inch. One pack of 6-inch tarp ball bungees contains 25 pieces.Easily fasten tarps or screens to canopy frames through the grommets or eyeletsTarp ball bungees are compatible with most canopy tarps, canopy tops and canopy screens with grommetsBungee length is approximately 6 inches Ball size is approximately 1 inch Fits most canopy framesTarp ball bungees are easily installed, removed or repositionedReusableGet the right coverage - click here for Home Depot's buying guide
